projectGridLines.title: Sensor design and Automated Inspection at Nondestructive Evaluation Lab
projectGridLines.description:
Description: In this role, candidate will have the opportunity work in nondestructive evaluation (NDE) â€“ (a) developing sensors for eddy current and other inspection applications, ensuring optimal performance and sensitivity (b) robotic path planning for developing optimized path planning models and Augmented Reality (c) developing image analytics and machine learning (ML) algorithms. Candidates will get an opportunity to work hands-on using Cobots, robotic platforms and NDE systems

Skill sets: Experience in developing custom user-defined functions for CAD software and Computer vision is required. Exposure to data science using MATLAB, Python or Java is essential for this role

Traits expectation: Fast learner, high curiosity, ready to do hands-on work @ Lab, Strong commitment and ownership.

Expected learning: Understand key requirement of sensor design, development and deployment for inspections

Specific courses required for project execution: Core Courses in above disciplines (Electromagnetic Fields & Microwave Engineering, Digital Signal Processing, Transducers & Measurement Systems, Electronic Instruments & Instrumentation Technology, Electromagnetic Theory, Computational Physics, Digital Image Processing, Robotics, AI for Robotics)
